img_above_text:
![Foothills Walkthrough \(126\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b4/Foothills_Walkthrough_%28126%29.png)
You'll come back to the path where you first spawn into the level. Fly up and just above the start of the path, where you'll find a curved tree.
img_below_text:
Land behind it and you'll find a chest.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(124\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/42/Foothills_Walkthrough_%28124%29.png)

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image depicts a character, possibly the player, levitating on a cloud near a mossy, rocky path surrounded by dense trees. A red arrow highlights a curved tree in the background, suggesting it as a point of interest or a landmark.

2. **Purpose, Content, or Narrative Role**:  
The image serves as a visual guide to help players locate the curved tree mentioned in the preceding text. This tree marks a key location on the path where players should land to progress further and discover a hidden chest, as described in the following text.
